translations: vt.给……带来不便，给……造成困扰（inconvenience 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: This way you will avoid inconveniencing others.
sentences.translation: 这样你就能避免给别人带来不便。

sentences.sentence: We apologize for inconveniencing you in this way.
sentences.translation: 我们对给你带来这样的不便表示歉意。

sentences.sentence: When he did hold a news conference, he apologized for "inconveniencing the customers."
sentences.translation: 而即便在他召开新闻发布会时，他也仅仅是对“给顾客带来不便”表示歉意。
